JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Senior Project Manager, Transitional Energies, DK - Esbjerg
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Senior Project Manager, Transitional Energies

Are you an experienced and motivated Senior Project Manager ready to leave your mark on the global energy industry? Do you have strong leadership skills and a commercial mindset to inspire and guide diverse project teams? If so, we have the perfect opportunity for you!

Your position
As Senior Project Manager in our Transitional Energies division, you will join a dedicated team of strong colleagues. The division spans three core areas: Projects, Service, and Manpower, delivering solutions to the conventional and emerging energy industries

In this position, you will lead complex projects, manage diverse teams, and drive a culture of safety, integrity, and compliance. You will have the opportunity to deliver innovative solutions that make a tangible difference in the global energy sector.

At Semco Maritime safety is a core value, and in this role, you will contribute to maintaining and promoting a strong safety culture while delivering innovative solutions. Above all, your work will make a real change for the global energy sector.

Your place of work will be at our global headquarters in Esbjerg – the hub of Denmark’s energy industry, located right on the waterfront with stunning views. The position is full-time, and you can expect up to 20 travel days per year.

" The Engineering and Projects department executes projects spanning across conventional resources, Power to X, Carbon Capture, Utilisation and Storage and energy storage systems. We are at the forefront of the energy transition. The exactly right place to be as project manager if you want to be part of the transition.?" – E&P Senior Director, Henrik Løbner Rosenberg

Your tasks & responsibilities

As a Senior Project Manager, you will take ownership of key projects and ensure successful execution.

Your tasks will include, but are not limited to:

  • Developing and execution short- and long-term projects.
  • Providing inspiring leadership with clear roles and responsibilities
  • Delivering projects within time, quality, and budget targets
  • Participating in steering committees and supporting tender processes
  • Managing complex project budgets and ensuring accountability for all project activities
  • Supporting and adhering to health, safety, and environmental standards, in all activities


Your profile & qualifications

We are looking for a proactive and organized Senior Project Manager who thrives in a multidisciplinary technical environment and is eager to create results. You are a strategic thinker with great communication and leadership skills, capable of inspiring diverse teams to achieve their goals.

To succeed in this role, you likely have:

  • A technical or engineering educational background
  • Extensive project management experience, preferably with complex projects in the energy sector.
  • Experience with client relations, stakeholder management, and tender processes
  • Relevant project management certification
  • Experience with offshore or onshore energy projects.
  • Knowledge of safety standards


Welcome to Semco Maritime

At Semco Maritime, we create change. For people. For projects. And for the global energy sector. With us, you will join a community of over 2,500 of the most dedicated thinkers and doers in the energy industry who are driving real change and making their own personal mark on the global energy landscape.

While everyone knows why the energy transition is vital, we are concerned with the journey. How to get there. By providing the answers needed to make change real. Because we believe that global energy ambitions can only be realized through hard work and clever pragmatic solutions. This is what we do. This is what we invite you to participate in.

Safety is at the core of everything we do, and we are committed to protecting our people, partners, and the planet as we work towards a sustainable energy future.

So yes, working for us will change the energy sector – and may well change you too.

Care to join the movement?

Change. With us.
Apply
https://semcomaritime.career.emply.com/ad/senior-project-manager-transitional-energies/1kmqzq/en

Semco Maritime is an international engineering and contracting company with 2,400 employees and 40 years of dedication rooted in both the conventional energy sector and the offshore wind industry. This puts us in a unique position to bridge today's and tomorrow’s solutions, constantly seeking clever and pragmatic ways to realise global energy ambitions. We do this through comprehensive project management across all phases of energy projects together with world-leading partners across the globe.

https://www.semcomaritime.com/
